text: Ivan Mariz (January 16, 1910 - May 13, 1982) was a former Brazilian football player. He played for the Brazil national team. ==Honours== ===Club=== * Campeonato Carioca (1): ::Fluminense: 1936 ===National=== * Copa Roca (2): ::Brazil: 1931, 1932 Category:1910 births Category:1982 deaths Category:Footballers from Bel√©m Category:1930 FIFA World Cup players
